name: Outro
_source: speak;Ahmari;Heh, you young'uns are real powerful...|I should never have let Hakeem get the drop on me.
speak;Prof;I don't think anyone was expecting their tribe to turn on you.
speak;Ahmari;We all fight for our own.|He chose to side with the Aurelians for his tribe.|I cannot fault him.
speak;Ahmari;The prevailing winds were ours, that's that.|Though I feel I must keep the affairs here in order...
speak;Leap;In the end, we caused more trouble...
speak;Ahmari;Nah, you aren't seeing clearly.|You helped me, without you, my tribe would be in danger...|Here, I have an offering.
speak;Leap;I hope we didn't just waste everyones time...
speak;Prof;Come, Leap.|We did what we had to.
speak;Ahmari;Here is Joker, he is a powerful right-hand for the tribe.
speak;Joker;I am not great with outsiders...|But, Ahmari said you are good people.
speak;Ahmari;I gave Joker our dragon axe, which should help you take down Monsdor.|Their wyverns will be dust beneath its might!
speak;Joker;But, where are we going now?
speak;Leap;Sages might need help...|But, Monsdor out of the picture helps us both...
speak;Prof;Is this more for Sages, or for revenge...?
speak;Leap;Does it matter? They deserve it anyway!
speak;Ahmari;Revenge is a fools game.|That being said, a true warrior must fight to the end!|Once I am strong again, I will lend my aid.|I will assemble the rest of the tribe, I swear it!
speak;Joker;Fight we shall, for the pride of the Za'hul!
